mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure buttons and navigation elements are larger and easier to interact with on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and use modern image formats like WebP to speed up load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions and title tags for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Provide clearer navigation and a more prominent call-to-action button for bookings.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps or pages involved.
tips: Consider adding more localized content for better search rankings.
